thread.title: gets caught in a blizzard in New York |
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham gets caught in a blizzard in New York | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: gets caught in a blizzard in New York |
text:
Her husband is back home in London after being caught up in an email hacking scandal.
And Victoria Beckham found herself going from one storm to another as she got caught up in a blizzard when leaving her New York hotel on Thursday.
No doubt hoping it would all blow over, the 42-year-old designer stepped out regardless, with a helpful doorman shielding her with an umbrella as she dashed to her waiting car.
Scroll down for video
There's snow escape! Victoria Beckham found herself going from one storm to another as she got caught up in a blizzard when leaving her New York hotel on Thursday
Keep it classic in a camel coat like Victoria £2250 VICTORIA BECKHAM Double-breasted wool coat
Now sold out - click to shop the current collection at Net-a-Porter
Buy now
Asides from her designing talents, Victoria Beckham does a great job of modelling her own creations in the flesh. So we weren’t surprised to find ourselves lusting over VB’s gorgeous camel coat from last year's fall collection which oozed luxury in a timeless way.
Although, with the look of that New York weather, Victoria's probably more in need of a snowsuit right now!
Classic and chic, we love the simple cut and double-breasted style that gives a nod to the 'borrowed from the boys' look. From denim to dresses, it's the kind of coat that will turn heads no matter what you wear it with, plus it will never date for years to come.
Although Victoria's exact camel coat has now sold out, the good news is there's some amazing high-street replicas to get the look. A camel coat is a must have for your collection, so get shopping our top picks below from The Kooples, La Redoute, Autograph, Sandro and ASOS - all budgets covered!

Dressed sensibly for the icy conditions, Victoria swapped her trademark heels for white trainers which peeked out beneath flared black trousers.
Layering up, the eponymous designer donned a chic camel coat whilst a black satchel was slung across her slender frame.
Despite the distinct lack of sunshine, the mother-of-four also donned a pair of oversized sunglasses.
Sweeping her tousled tresses back as the winds picked up and the snow battered down, Victoria still managed to look the epitome of grace and class.
Under cover: No doubt hoping it would all blow over, the 42-year-old designer stepped out regardless, with a helpful doorman shielding her with an umbrella as she dashed to her car
Victoria has been across the pond working on her latest collection for New York Fashion Week.
With her runway presentation scheduled for Sunday it's no doubt been a busy time for the star, who has come under fire from fans for pushing her brand amid her husband's email scandal.
As she tried to focus on her own business by sharing products from her Spring/Summer collection on Monday, the backlash turned on her - with critics slamming her for her husband's emails and for using slim models.
Those shoes were made for walking: Dressed sensibly for the icy conditions, Victoria swapped her trademark heels for white trainers which peeked out beneath flared black trousers
Chic and cheerful: Layering up, the eponymous designer donned a chic camel coat whilst a black satchel was slung across her slender frame
After sharing an image of her collection, one angry Quote: : 'Anorexic chic was so yesterday!'
Another user accused the former Spice Girl of arrogance, adding: 'u had a 'small' girl band a 100 yrs ago get over it. u r by no means a rock or any legend. move on honey. arrogant (sic).'
Then came the criticism over David's emails: 'Sorry your husband has lost the plot he said what he said he need to get over it. (sic)'
One quipped: 'Tell David its about time people can now see what he is really like. He stopped becoming a footballer when he met you.'
Throwing shades: Despite the distinct lack of sunshine, the mother-of-four also donned a pair of oversized sunglasses but managed to retain her composure on the outing
In the leak, David reacted angrily when he found out he had been passed over for a knighthood.
The former England captain branded the Honours Committee ‘unappreciative c***s’ and dismissed lower awards, ranting: ‘Unless it’s a knighthood f*** off’.
According to the revelations, the Honours Committee had already agreed that Beckham's nomination – almost certainly proposed by his PR advisers – was well 'merited' before a routine check of his tax affairs.
The leaked emails also include a number of bombshells and series of sweary-rants and may even have been used as part of a £1million blackmail plot.
In one message the ex-England captain allegedly claims singer Katherine Jenkins, 36, got an OBE for ‘singing at the rugby and going to see the troops plus taking coke. F
